message: I'll give you a good deal, but I want a bit more!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I want to get a bit more to keep up with the inflation!
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob! I need a fair deal to make up for the inflation!
I'm starting to get a bit worried about the deadline, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but I need to think about myself too!
I'm running out of patience, Bob! I need a fair deal to make up for the inflation, or I'll walk away!
I'm not backing down, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give in completely!

I'm not going to get a better deal than this. You win, Alice. Congratulations!
